itemDescription: Northern Ireland's first Chief Nursing Officer

wikipedia_page.main: Mona Elizabeth Clara Grey   (24 September 1910 – 27 May 2009) was a British nurse who was named Northern Ireland's first Chief Nursing Officer (CNO) in 1960.

response: *  2009   – Mona Grey, British nursing administrator; Northern Ireland's first Chief Nursing Officer
*Mona Grey, 98, British public servant, Chief Nursing Officer for Northern Ireland.
* Mona Grey, British nurse, first Chief Nursing Officer of Northern Ireland and secretary of the Royal College of Nursing in Northern Ireland
